title: 이달의소녀탐구 #417 (LOONA TV #417)
summary:
0:01 -- JinSoul mentions that the background looks similar to Hong kong.
0:14 -- The LOOΠΔ TV focusses on the journey. We go back in time.
0:16 -- HeeJin points to a structure that looks similar to the one in Yves' 'new' MV. Lip mentions that it was super cold the last time they were here but now it's very hot.
0:42 -- HeeJin points to the building where the last scene from Egoist was shot. It was very cold back then. "However we are trying to overcome the heat."
